mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HR_INFO ( HR_ID, HR_NAME, HR_GENDER, HR_AGE, HR_MAIL, HR_PHONE, HR_COMPANY_ID, HR_ON_JOB, HR_WORKINGCARDNUM) VALUES ( #{hr_id}, #{hr_name}, #{hr_gender}, #{hr_age}, #{hr_mail}, #{hr_phone}, #{hr_company_id}, #{hr_on_job}, #{hr_workingcardnum} )
mapper.update: UPDATE HR_INFO SET HR_NAME = #{hr_name}, HR_GENDER = #{hr_gender}, HR_AGE = #{hr_age}, HR_MAIL = #{hr_mail}, HR_PHONE = #{hr_phone}, HR_COMPANY_ID = #{hr_company_id}, HR_ON_JOB = #{hr_on_job}, HR_WORKINGCARDNUM = #{hr_workingcardnum} WHERE HR_ID = #{hr_id}
SELECT HR_ID, HR_NAME, HR_GENDER, HR_AGE, HR_MAIL, HR_PHONE, HR_COMPANY_ID, HR_ON_JOB, HR_WORKINGCARDNUM FROM HR_INFO WHERE HR_ID =#{hr_id}
